snippet.title: Stuffo the Puzzle Bot - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Stuffo the Puzzle Bot releases on March 2, 2023 on Steam and Apple App Store! The game will have a 20% discount at launch.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1068460/Stuffo_the_Puzzle_Bot/
App Store page, with preordering available, coming soon!

Stuffo is the last remaining puzzle bot stuck in a world filled with bite-sized brain-teasers. Help Stuffo to solve the mind-bending puzzles by using various blocks to climb, push and teleport your way to the exit.

KEY FEATURES
- Approachable yet smart puzzle gameplay.
- A laid-back experience that challenges your brain, not your reflexes.
- Chill out to the deep downtempo beats and ambient atmosphere of the original soundtrack.
- No story whatsoever but loads of vibes!
- 65 levels with more to come after release.

ABOUT HAPATUS LTD.
Hapatus is the creative outlet for solo projects of Antti Tiihonen. He is one of the masterminds behind Legend of Grimrock -series of dungeon crawling RPGs where he created tons of puzzles, levels, game design, audio and graphics as a warmup excercise for Stuffo ;). He has also worked on titles such as Noita, Control, Alan Wake and Druidstone. Hapatus is based in Helsinki, Finland.
